Description:
Coast Meets Country
This near new, 18-month-old home offers low maintenance, contemporary living, set within a private cul-de-sac and offering a unique rural outlook all upon a 491m2 block.
The home is light, bright and offers a neutral colour palette throughout. The fully equipped kitchen with 900ml electric oven, 5 burner gas cook top and 40ml stone benchtops, also offers a spacious walk-in-pantry and overlooks the dining and open living space. Well zoned, the master bedroom sits at the fore of the home with walk-in-robe and ensuite, while the remaining 2 bedrooms offer built-in-robes. A separate lounge, study nook, central bathroom and laundry complete this neat as a pin abode.
The serene rural outlook can be enjoyed from the main hub of the home, before sliding doors provide access to the extended outdoor undercover entertaining space, with a second undercover pergola also on offer.
Additional features include ducted heating, split system heating and cooling, an abundance of storage, DLUG with internal and external access, over-sized garden shed, low maintenance gardens front and back and all complete with additional side storage for multiple cars, caravans, boats or the trailer.
A tightly held pocket close to public transport, major amenities, and the best of the Bellarine all at your fingertips, this home will suit anyone from first home buyers, the growing family or downsizers who are still looking for space to tinker!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 7 Jackwood Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Golf Course Views With Big Potential!
When a classic home like this presents itself after not being on the market for nearly 20 years, you definitely need to add a property like this to your inspection list. 22 Coronae Drive presents a great opportunity for those looking to break into the first home buyer market, those looking to renovate and invest or build something to your own tastes and requirements or townhouse development (STCA). The home is a blank palette and with the right amount of imagination could be transformed into something special. Featuring a classic floorplan design with 3 bedrooms, a spacious living room and a practical kitchen, the home is offset with a fantastic outlook and access to the Clifton Springs Golf Club. Located close to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private & access to the Bellarine Peninsulas world class restaurants & wineries - all of which enhance the opportunity for the savvy buyer to see the appeal of this prestigious location.
Land size: 722sqm approx.
Insights: 22 Coronae Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Custom Built Modern Home
A modern design and perfect location to the entire Bellarine Peninsula, this custom built one of a kind 4BR family home is an ideal fit for buyers looking for a superior finish, ample car storage, indoor/outdoor living and a Clifton Springs address. Sleeping quarters are at the front of the home and designed to enjoy privacy and space with oversized bedrooms, whilst the rear of the home enjoys a large well-appointed galley style kitchen overlooking the living spaces comprising carpeted rumpus room and open plan living dining area flowing onto a spacious undercover alfresco entertaining with bar. The timber laminated floors run through the high traffic areas of the home creating ease of living with modern tones, whilst the generous triple garage with drive through 2.3m high access into the secure yard coupled with ample off street parking in the driveway create space for the boat or Caravan. Added features include home office/study, modern timber on white finish, ducted heating, reverse cycle air conditioning and a Clifton Springs Primary School zoned position. One out of the box with nothing left to do and less than 12 months old, the home is ready for its new family to move in and enjoy.

Description:
Sweet First Home - Potential Plus
Perfect for the first home buyer or renovator ! This little gem is ready for a fresh coat of paint and some modern touches. The substantial residential allotment of 777m2 offers an investment for the future for the lucky purchaser. Located in a quiet street close to the centre of Drysdale and the Clifton Springs boat ramp & golf club.
The living area faces north and is flooded with dappled light from established trees at the front and side of the property. An adjacent dining area and kitchen provide a spacious open plan. Three good-sized bedrooms with BIRs x 2 and floor to ceiling windows that allow plenty of light.
A single colorbond garage has power connected/ concrete flooring and a single carport nearby. Located close to public transport and local schools.

Description:
Top Shelf Executive Residence!
Boasting a stylish, sleek contemporary flair this 'as new' residence of the highest calibre is sure to turn heads. A classic open plan design showcases expansive window features (double glazed) which frame truly spectacular water views and promote wonderful light filled living zones. This fine property represents a 'top shelf' down size 'or' executive style residence with a 'low maintenance' brief.
Three beautifully appointed bedrooms; master is complete with ensuite with oversized shower recess and walk in robe. The 2 additional bedrooms form a guest wing and are serviced by a stunning family bathroom, complete with a luxurious free standing bath.
A sophisticated kitchen design is nothing short of eye catching, featuring custom cabinetry which provide excellent storage solutions, dual stone bench tops, pendant lighting, and a stainless steel gas cook top all further endorse the uncompromising design brief.
This property possesses a classic open-plan design with an enviable northerly aspect. Crisp white finishes, striking polished timber floors and expansive windows enhance the free flowing living zone and a classic Coonara creates a wonderful ambience. A trio of glass stacker doors create a seamless connection to a hardwood decked alfresco (a glorious space to take in an early coffee and gaze across deep blue water vistas).
This fine residence boasts an impressive inclusions list to be discovered on further inspection. All the modern comforts built with efficient green living in mind and set within a peaceful court location completes the picture.
A double remote controlled garage with internal access
This truly limited and exclusive property offering is sure to be 'hot property' from day 1
The Bellarine Peninsula is a thriving market place; vibrant restaurant and cafe scene, award winning wine labels, beautiful parklands, excellent boating and fishing prospects and the unforgettable panoramic views of the bay and granite peaks of the You Yang's
Insights: 13B Taronga Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 37 Clear Water Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Tranquility Plus
Four !! That was a happy golfer at the rear of the property playing on one of the premium golf courses on the Bellarine - this could be you ! If you are wanting to escape the noise of heavy traffic and hear the calling of birds and the rustle of wind in the trees in this tranquil setting 37 Clear Water is the location for your new home. Situated within a couple of minutes walk from a great meal at the Clifton Springs Golf Club followed by a stroll down to the water at the Dell.
The Clifton Springs Golf Club or Bowling Club are at your door step. Cafes and wineries of the Bellarine nearby and 10 minutes to the Portarlington Ferry. The Drysdale town centre is only 5 minutes away with all local amenities.
Blocks of approximately 602m2 block in this location are almost impossible to secure. Call now to speak to the agent.

Description:
STYLISH TOWNHOUSE WITH BAY VIEWS!
Only two on the block and No. 2 is a gem with views and privacy, professionals, investors and first time buyers take note . The open plan area is extra generous, includes dining, living and fabulous kitchen, all opening to the wrap around balcony. Upstairs master bedroom with ensuite and WIR, remaining two downstairs have BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry, powder room on lower level complete the plan. Features bamboo floors, stone benches, dishwasher, pantry, central heating, split system, loads of storage, quality fittings and window furnishings. Light and bright throughout with the garden providing a private space to sit and relax. Extra large double garage and storage room. Style, privacy, nothing to do, architect designed, this is a rare chance to have the lot on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula .
THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO PUBLIC OPEN HOMES SCHEDULED.
Please call the agent to book a private inspection.

Description:
INVEST NOW , A COASTAL CHARMER AND AFFORDABLE.
You cannot go wrong here at No. 4 Bahloo, feels good , is good with a light and bright open area including renovated kitchen, dining and living. Three bedrooms all with BIR'S, central bathroom with spa, laundry and separate toilet. The features include central heating, air cooler, dishwasher, pantry and quality window furnishings. Outside is fabulous with the matured garden, fernery and lush lawns giving privacy. Double garage, large carport and room for more vehicles, small shed and 5,500 litre watertank complete the picture. The position is within walking distance of schools, clubs, jetty and the dell....pack a picnic and stroll down. Put your dollars in bricks, No. 4 is the way to go. A good one for that first time buy and downsize maybe. Tenant would love to stay.
THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO PUBLIC OPEN HOMES SCHEDULED. CALL TO BOOK TIME FOR PRIVATE INSPECTION SATURDAY AND/OR ANY OTHER DAYTIME

Description:
Perfectly Presented Family Home
This 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom family home is ideally positioned close to schools, local shops, skate park and the best playground on the Bellarine ! Not to mention close to the tennis courts and Jetty Road boat ramp and harbour.
Having been tastefully renovated it is ready for you to move straight in and enjoy the lifestyle of the Bellarine Peninsula.
The neutral pallet is perfect to make your own. Two double bedrooms with built in robes and central bathroom at one end of the home, and a good sized master bedroom, with walk through robe and brand new ensuite at the other end.
Positioned on a large 581 m2 block, with a separate double garage with automatic door and garden shed on the side. You also have the added benefit of double gates to be able to access the rear garden and secure a boat or caravan.
Suitable for downsizers, investors or first time buyers, this home hits the spot.
You rarely find a property at this price, in such fantastic condition, on such a great size block.
Arrange a private inspection today.
This property is priced to sell.

Description:
Entertainers Delight with Sweeping Bay Views!
Mesmerising sunsets, gentle summer breezes and undulating, uninterrupted Bay Views - this could be the lifestyle change you have been waiting for! Not to be missed, this unique coastal meet country abode offers functional family living all while being situated upon a whopping 796m2 block.
Positioned back from the street offers a sense of added privacy and you're greeted by the manicured, rose lined front garden. Split over 2 levels, the ground floor comprises a grand master retreat with walk-in-robe and en-suite, floor to ceiling windows with Bay and rural views and complete by private sliding door access to the back deck - a true parents oasis! A second bedroom with Bay views and built-in-robes, laundry, separate toilet and access to the back garden complete this level. Float upstairs and you're greeted by a spacious kitchen with gas cooktop, electric oven and stainless-steel dishwasher, while overlooking the light-filled dining and living space, which offers access to the wrap-around balcony. The 3rd bedroom also offers Bay views and a versatile study/4th bedroom both hosts built-in-robes and serviced by the central family bathroom with shower over bath, vanity and toilet. A spacious 2nd living area at the rear offers breathtaking, panoramic Bay views with seamless floor to ceiling windows and flows effortlessly onto the spacious undercover outdoor entertaining area. The back garden offers multiple sitting areas, an open grassed and hours of fun to be had in the above ground pool.
Additional features of the home include: Heating and Cooling, tinted northerly facing windows, 2 x garden sheds, water tank, double carport and additional room for multiple cars, boats, caravans and all toys in between.
Located in an elevated, enviable pocket of Clifton Springs and within walking distance to public transport, the Bay, Golf Club and within proximity to all major amenities, supermarkets and schools, the best of the Bellarine is waiting for you.

Description:
Magic On Mirrabooka!
The Openn Negotiation has started (auction held online that allows flexible terms for qualified buyers). The property can sell at any time. Contact Lee Martin on 0400 957 839 or Ange Callan-Harris on 0423 295 705 immediately to become qualified and avoid missing out.
The Feel:
Presenting with an immediate warmth and charm identified with the feeling of home, this 3 bedroom property has been beautifully renovated for immediate enjoyment. Separate living and sleeping zones mean ease of living is prioritised, with seamless flow to the impressive gardens and open space of the rear yard; complete with in-ground swimming pool.
The Facts:
-Tasteful, quality renovation completed throughout
-Multiple NF living areas with You Yang and Bay views
-Classic timber kitchen overlooking beautiful gardens
-Seamless integration with the outdoor alfresco zone
-Solar heated swimming pool and surrounding deck
-Picturesque and privatised gardens across 1171m2 (approx)
-Sitting room with flexibility as a study/home office
-Separately placed master with WIR and stunning ensuite
-2 further BRs share the main bath with dual vanities
-Open fireplace, ducted heating and R/C air conditioning
-Freshly painted, timber floors and plenty of charm
-DLUG with rear roller access, extra parking for boats/trailers
-A fantastic floorplan for families or a luxurious holiday home
- maintained and ready to be enjoyed
-Placed for convenience to all town assets and practicalities
-A short distance to award winning wineries and eateries
The Owner Loves.
The amount of space and privacy we have here allows us to fully relax and make the most of being at home. This floorplan has been perfect as a growing family and the location convenient, yet quiet in the busier months.

Address: 55-57 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
A PRIVATE & SPACIOUS OASIS
Upon entering this beautiful home you are greeted by a spacious grand formal living room with beautiful bay window overlooking lovely landscaped gardens. The home further features 3 bedrooms including Master with lovely french doors, double WIR & ensuite, family room, a fantastic home office/study plus functional kitchen & dining area which flows out to a brilliant outdoor space perfect for entertaining! Outside further enjoys a handyman's workshop & generous car accommodation. Set on a generous 1171m2 allotment with fully fenced lush gardens, this fabulous family home is a private oasis perfect for those who desire space with ample room the boat or caravan. This is the perfect opportunity to enjoy seaside living with the Clifton Springs Boat ramp, Golf and Bowls Club all a short distance away plus local shops and amenities all in close proximity. This wonderful home is warm & inviting and truly one not to be missed!

Description:
Renovated, Refreshed, Ready
New to the market is this fully-renovated, solid brick house in Clifton Springs that is packed with pleasant surprises. Refreshed from the front to the back, the multiple living options on offer will appeal to those on the hunt for space.
Cleverly divided into three clear zones with a parents escape at the front with the master, en suite, walk-in robe and formal lounge.
The hub of the home is at the centre with an open-plan and spacious living and dining room. The modern kitchen boasts soft-close cabinetry, self-cleaning wall oven, five-burner stove top, stone bench, dishwasher and corner pantry.
On the other side of the hallway door is the childrens wing with three double bedrooms with built-in robes and a multi-purpose area that leads to outside. Set it up as a playroom, study, home office or teenagers retreat. From here the kids can easily spill out to the backyard for uninterrupted play.
Additional features include double lock-up garage with through access, large outdoor undercover entertaining spot with a wood fire, ceiling fans, new carpet, air-conditioner, water tank, 20 solar panels with 5 kilowatt converter, two garden sheds, fruit trees and raised vegetable beds.
Located within close proximity to the local shopping centre, parks, schools and easy access to the highway into Geelong and Melbourne. Clifton Springs Golf Club and water are only 500 metres away and it is a two minute drive to the heart of Drysdale.

Description:
Sensational Starter, Ideal Investment!
With enviable garden outlooks from most windows and Bay glimpses, this neat as a pin abode located in an elevated pocket of Clifton Springs will impress! Perfect as is or scope to update and personalise, this will tick all the boxes for first home buying, downsizing or savvy investing.
Feeling like home from the moment you walk in, you're welcomed by the warmth of timber floorboards and spacious open planned living with the lounge, dining and fully equipped kitchen. 3 large bedrooms all with built-in-robes are positioned from the rear hallway and are serviced by a central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. The picture is perfectly complete with established and manicured gardens boasting an array of flowers and plants, veggie patches, outdoor undercover area and more than enough space for multiple cars, boats and all the toys.
Additional features of the home include - double carport with further secure rear access, tinted windows, heating and cooling, surround sound speakers, alarm system, 2 x garden sheds and water tank.
Walking distance to the Bay, public transport, Golf Club, shops, pre and primary schools, with the remainder of the booming Bellarine at your fingertips - This will not last long!

Description:
Stunning custom home with panoramic views.
Situated on an elevated block with stunning views over the bay, this quality, custom-built residence is sure to impress from the moment you set foot inside.
With luxury finishes, this remarkable property offers 27 Squares (approx.) of modern living, three spacious bedrooms with easy conversion to fourth, 2 bathrooms, with Spa-bath in main, all controlled through a state-of-the-art C-BUS system that operates all lights, blinds (in main living area), surround sound in all rooms, and impressive mood and night lighting controlled centrally on the touch display or with the individual LCD switches.
Upstairs, the sleek kitchen offers waterfall stone benches, stainless European appliances, and is accompanied by an expansive living area that opens through triple stacking doors to a large deck, with sweeping views of pristine waters, the Geelong City lights and the picturesque You Yangs, perfect for year-round entertainment.
The opulent master suite has been cleverly designed and features a large dressing room complete with built-in cabinetry, as well as a luxurious ensuite and a private deck with access to the kitchen.
Family and guests will be spoilt downstairs with 2 spacious bedrooms serviced by a grand central bathroom, as well as a large living area, bar with sink and a private deck.
Notable Features Include:
- Gleaming Tasmanian oak floors and staircase.
- Oversized double garage with, TV point and speakers.
- Established and landscaped gardens.
- Split systems in upstairs living and main bedroom.
- Ducted heating throughout.
- Ducted vacuum system with sweep point in the kitchen.
- Video doorbell with feed to kitchen and CCTV recording.
- Side access for boat or caravan.
Located just a short drive away from the Bellarines finest Schools, famous wineries, Clifton Springs Golf Club, or the local boat ramp and shops. Just 15 minutes to Leopolds Gateway Plaza, and 25 minutes to the Geelong CBD, this location is certainly one of the golden pockets of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Insights: 44 Narawi Avenue, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Delight on 650m2
A sublime fusion where comfortable and contemporary meets convenience and practicality. No stone left unturned with this chic renovation, allowing the new owners to move in and enjoy every aspect this home has to offer.
A compact footprint yet free flowing and astute; comprising 3 bedrooms, all equipped with built-in-robes and 2 with ceiling fans. A central two-way bathroom with access from the main bedroom, including floor to ceiling tiles, shower niches, timber vanity, heated towel rail, backlit vanity and deep bath. A beautiful light filled living area that veers into a study/reading nook with access to the lush galley kitchen. The kitchen has been decked out with induction cooking, 40ml stone benchtops and soft close drawers overlooking the dining with views of the garden. A separate toilet and laundry complete this neat and tidy package.
In a court location, the home is a delight but, it is the outside component that makes this package even more lucrative. There is room to park cars or a caravan in the front yard plus a double lock up carport (remote entry) that has through access into the yard where you will find an oversized garage that includes, power, work bench, storage space and small wood heater. A divine undercover area that has been tiled for appeal and ease, with fitted café blinds and timber double gates leading to the garden, a fantastic entertaining area that can be utilised in so many ways and, the serene garden which offers complete Zen. Lush green grass, decade old established trees, planter boxes, garden shed, timber shed, water tanks, and a private deck to lose yourself in a good book or sunbake in private.
Features of the home include, split system heating and cooling, wood heater, ample storage, ceiling fans and established gardens.
This home has so much going for it, including the fantastic location being minutes to the Bay, Beacon Point Reserve, public transport and a short drive to the main township.
Situated upon 650m2 this stunning package will be popular amongst first home buyers, investors and downsizers alike.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.
Insights: 3 Talinga Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2020 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 8 Corio Bay Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Breathtaking Panorama!
The breathtaking panorama viewed from this outstanding property could be mistaken for the French Riviera or numerous sought after locations across the globe. Dreamed of by many but appreciated by the lucky few. Located in the prestigious High Ridge Estate Clifton Springs with incredible bay and rural views. This stylish contemporary home has blended beautifully with its rural and coastal surroundings. Nestled in established garden settings in a secluded court position. Act quickly to secure the prospect of calling this amazing property your own.
- Location, location central to the Bellarine Peninsula
- Walking distance to sheltered swimming spots
- Beautiful, unique vistas upstairs and downstairs with a north facing aspect to warm and lighten this amazing home
- Sprawling living spaces with cosy, intimate corners throughout
- Showcase picture window that captures the magic of Corio Bay, the You Yangs and the rural Bellarine Hills
- Private retreat for the home owner which includes a master suite with shower room, spacious WIR, study nook, library and private balcony.
- Quality timber parquetry flooring
- Elevated kitchen the centre hub of the living area with SS appliances, ample cupboards and views
- Wine cellar
- Protected entertaining deck, private guest room with ensuite and adjacent gym
- Stylishly renovated main bathroom with stand alone bathtub
- Minor bedrooms share a private 2-way ensuite
- Stand alone 6.5m x 6.5m approx brick workshop/ double garage
- Heated swim spa and tennis court
- Water tanks with approx 50,000 litre capacity
- Double glazing, split systems, gas log fire, solid fuel heater
- Over height double garage with 3m x 4.5m remote door
Private inspections only, call the agent to discuss this fantastic property !
Disclaimer:
Information contained on any marketing material, website or other portal should not be relied upon. You should make your own enquiries and seek your own independent advice with respect to any property advertised or the information about the property.

Description:
Private, Quiet and Ready for You to Buy it!
Located in a quiet court, this private three bedroom double-brick home has all the bells and whistles for the first home buyer or the astute investor.
Timber paneling & brickwork are a feature in the spacious living area with exposed beams, split system air conditioning & mains gas wall heater.
Step into the expansive dining room and kitchen area. Polished tiles, laminate benchtops, gas cooktop & oven, offering plenty of cupboard space for pots, pans or anything else you may need.
Comprising 3 bedrooms plus a study. All bedrooms have built in robes & each is climate controlled by their own split system air-conditioner. Master bedroom with direct access to the updated bathroom.
A terrific backyard set on a large 599 sqm (approx) allotment.
